title: Using the Likert Scale on the Hottest Topics in the NFL
description:
Sheil and Danny go through the hottest topics in the NFL including Russell Wilson’s new contract, Jimmy G staying in San Francisco, Justin Fields, the Jets, and more (00:46). Also, Sheil answers some of your listener mailbag questions (43:22).
Hosts: Sheil Kapadia and Danny Kelly
Associate Producer: Jessie Lopez
Additional Production Supervision: Arjuna Ramgopal and Conor Nevins
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
